QuestData.Title: Under the Choking Sands
QuestData.Description: No... it cannot be.$B$BOrsis is all but buried beneath the desert sands.$B$BThe enemy will pay for this.$B$BBut first we must aid my people. Quick, $n. We do not have much time before the last of my brethren are buried alive!
QuestData.CompletionText: I thank you for your help, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. Orsis was punished for not joining the forces of Deathwing.$B$BPrince Nadun has offered my people refuge in his city. I must go there and tend the survivors.
